A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A friend told me that Mark Hamill wrote somewhere that \"it's not Star Wars\".  After seeing the movie I get it and I totally agree with him. Silly jokes everywhere\, weak script\, good characters wasted\, cute and annoying pets...the list is endless. Plus\, the only one that got me has died. Ok\, Admiral Holdo death was amazing\, but she could be used on other parts. That's it. I'm disappointed.
